name: Job Manager
description: Overall job oversight, approvals, and strategic decision making across all job phases

name: Estimator
description: Creates and modifies job estimates, manages estimation phase activities and cost analysis

name: Planner
description: Resource allocation, scheduling, and planning phase management including equipment and labor coordination

name: Materials Coordinator
description: Materials requisition, inventory management, procurement activities and vendor coordination

name: Field Supervisor
description: On-site execution phase management, labor tracking, and field operations oversight

name: Quality Inspector
description: Review phase activities, quality control inspections, and compliance verification

name: Billing Clerk
description: Invoicing, billing operations, financial documentation and payment processing

name: API Employee
description: Basic employee access with read permissions for assigned jobs and time tracking capabilities

name: API Manager
description: Senior management with comprehensive access to all modules, reports, and strategic planning functions
